snippet: Under the new policy, the state will cover mastectomies as well as operations to remove and reconstruct reproductive organs.
abstract: Specific guidelines determining what services California will provide to transgender prisoners, including providing sex reassignment surgery for some, go into effect in state, making it first in nation with such policy.
lead_paragraph: Under the new policy, the state will cover mastectomies as well as operations to remove and reconstruct reproductive organs.

headline.print_headline: California Is First State to Adopt Sex Reassignment Surgery Policy for Prisoners
headline.main: California Is First State to Adopt Sex Reassignment Surgery Policy for Prisoners
